webpage:
FSF Europe - Contact Section
English
General Discussion
If you are interested in general discussion about the FSFE or would like to participate, please join one of our mailing lists.
Contact
In this section we will provide you with contact information for specific individuals or functions. It also informs you about the internal structure of the FSFE.
Generic email address
team@fsfeurope.org To contact everyone in the FSF Europe.
President and office
president@fsfeurope.org Address of the President & Vice-President of the FSF Europe. Currently held by Georg C. F. Greve and Loic Dachary.
office@fsfeurope.org For contacting the office of the FSFE Europe. Current head of office is Peter Gerwinski.
FSF Europe - Chapter France
chancellor@france.fsfeurope.org Address of the Chancellor & Vice-Chancellor of the French Chapter. Designated Chancellor is Frederic Couchet, Vice-Chancellor is n/a.
france@fsfeurope.org To contact everyone involved in the public French activities of the FSF Europe. This includes the FSF Europe and associated organizations.
FSF Europe - Chapter Germany
chancellor@germany.fsfeurope.org To contact the Chancellor & Vice-Chancellor of Germany. Currently held by Bernhard Reiter and Werner Koch.
germany@fsfeurope.org To contact everyone involved in the public German activities of the FSF Europe. This includes the FSF Europe and associated
Note
The President, Vice-President, Head of Office, German Chancellor and German Vice-Chancellor will be official as of Friday, 20th of April, 2001. The French Chancellor will remain "designated".
&menu;
